name: Spinach and Turkey Salad
description: Turkey or chicken transforms this classic spinach salad (minus the bacon) into a light main dish, welcome after Thanksgiving and before the rest of the holiday season feasting begins.
keywords: baby spinach, shredded turkey, wild rice, fall, gluten-free, healthy, low-sodium, low sugar, raw
recipeIngredient: 2 cups (12 ounces) shredded cooked turkey, chicken breast or chicken breast tenders
6 white or cremini mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 to 2 hard boiled eggs (to taste), finely chopped (optional)
1 to 2 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs such as parsley, tarragon or marjoram
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, tarragon vinegar or sherry vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the salad ingredients in a large salad bowl. Whisk together the lemon juice, vinegar, Dijon mustard, salt, pepper, garlic, olive oil and yogurt. Toss with the salad just before serving.
